The student <math alttext="S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>S</mi></math> is at rest relative to the bus and a ball sits at rest on the floor of the bus next to the student. The kinetic energies of the ball as measured by the student and the observer at this moment are <math alttext="K sub S 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>S</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub O 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>O</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>, respectively. The kinetic energies of the ball as measured by the student and the observer after the ball is kicked are <math alttext="K sub S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="K sub O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>K</mi><mrow><mi>O</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>, respectively.
